summary: This mod makes it possible to kill creatures and people with common objects like a pot, a fork, a bench etc. All new items can be craftet at forges and can be improved at grinding stones.
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=4][b]The butcher set v.1.0.0 
[/b][/size][/u]
This will be the FINAL version (1.0.0) after this i will only add items which are suggested by you guys and girls. 

Notice: 
-I'm the autor of the "Butcher Set" on Steam AND on Nexus 
-Please do not distribute without my permission. 
-I'm german so my english isn't the best. 
-Maybe some one else allready had this idea for a mod but i didn't build this mod on others. 
=============================================================================

Description: 

This mod gives you the opportunity to use most miscellaneous items (and some other items/models) as a weapon. These Weapons often aren't strong but it's funny to kill somebody with a fork or a pot. 
It's also featuring crafting and tempering recipes. The items are fully integrated into the loot system and there are two special enemys with unique weapons. 

=============================================================================

At the moment this mod features following content: 
Because the count of items is to big to list them all up here i've uploaded a picture of a list with all available. 

-All listed and blue marked items on the picture are fully available 
-A Giant Camp for a specific weapon 
-A Draugr Deathlord with a special shield (sadly i don't remember in which dungeon i placed him) 
=============================================================================

Upcoming 

-Small bug fixes 
-By the communty suggested items 

If you are experiencing bugs in the game or the installation doesn't work properly please contact me, i'll give my best to fix it. 
=============================================================================

Requirements: 
Skyrim latest version 
Installation: 
1. way (recommendet) Use NMM 
2. way extract the data folder from the archive in the Skyrim folder (where the Skyrim.exe is)


If you have any cool ideas for other things you can kill with just let me know and i'll give my best to make it possible. The item will probably come with one of the next updates. (7-14 days) 


It would be awesome if you could give me some feedback and a rating 

Special thanks goes to 

[Steam User] "Kalol20" for testing and ideas 
[Youtube User] "LeckerHamster" for his great NifSkope tutorial 
[Nexus User] "Paltiel" for beeing a good supporter of the mod 

Have a beautyfull day 
TheTruhvanor
author: esfewsf aka Der Truhvanor

files.name: TheButcherSetV 0_1_8
files.changelogHtml:
Version 0.1.8

NOTE: This update is rather small if you allready have v 0.1.7 you can use the small update file "TheButcherSet Update 0_1_7 to 0_1_8" and overwrite the old .esp with the new one. If you have an older version or none of the released versions and you are new to this mod (welcome by the way) use the main file "TheButcherSetV 0_1_8" (17900 kb).

[FIX]
-Builds the whole stuff available yet into the lootsystem
-Fixes some little values

[ADD]
-The Update doesn't contain any new Objects/Items

files.name: TheButcherSetV 0_1_9
files.changelogHtml:
Version 0.1.9

[ADD]
-Imperial Documents [dagger]
-Sons Documents [dagger]
-Strong Bearpelt [shield]- 3 different versions: normal, cave, polar; integrated in loot system
-Sacred Dragonstone [shield]- Placed in Skuldafn01

PS: This is probably one of the last updates (only 18 more items left). I'll try to get all remaining items on the list running and then it is done. If you have any suggestions for more items i will try to get them running too even after the "last" update.
